title: The worst part about climbing this season (worst part about dynamic queue tbh)
body:
No one surrenders anymore.

ADC doesn't connect until 10:00, 6 turrets down, enemy team has all the dragons, and the score is 30/10 at 20:00?

Better drag it out for 10 more minutes. Because the only thing more stupid than premades CAUSING those things to happen is the fact that they also won't surrender it when they fuck you over.

[](http://i.imgur.com/eDD1yoC.jpg)
